sentence.Network_en: Dusk features an array of choreographic works presented every night at sunset.
sentence.Network_cn: 在每日黄昏之际,为大家带来一系列的舞蹈作品.

sentence.Network_en: Water is incorporated as both an atmospheric and a choreographic element.
sentence.Network_cn: 水是成立既是一个大气和舞蹈元素.

sentence.Network_en: A brief choreographic presentation can add beauty and excitement to any show.
sentence.Network_cn: 一出简短的舞蹈表演能为任何节目增添美感和激情.

entry.def: Choreographic means relating to or connected with choreography.

example.ex: ...his choreographic work for The Birmingham Royal Ballet.
example.tran: 他为伯明翰皇家芭蕾舞团编排的作品

auth_sentence.content: Elsewhere, video torsos merge with real legs, or vice versa, exaggerating a general choreographic impulse to distort the body.
